thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: India's January trade deficit widens to $16.30 bln- trade ministry

author: Reuters Editorial
title: India's January trade deficit widens to $16.30 bln- trade ministry
text:
NEW DELHI, Feb 15 (Reuters) - Indiaâ€™s trade deficit widened to $16.30 billion in January from $14.88 billion in the previous month, government data showed on Thursday.
Merchandise exports for January rose 9.07 percent from a year ago to $24.38 billion.
Goods imports last month were $40.68 billion, a jump of 26.10 percent from a year ago, data from the Ministry of Commerce and Industry showed. (Reporting by Nidhi Verma; Editing by Krishna N. Das)
